posts.description:
Tasting Platter of Dips & Pates! Tag someone you'd share this with! üòÅ

Had this Dips Platter at @terttuliamumbai, Dadar Shivaji Park as part of #GourmetDay by @wowtables. You have classic roasted Hummus, Tzatziki dip, Sundried-tomato & olive dip, and Mushroom Pate served with grilled pita and lavash flatbread sticks. Simple, yet so delicious! üòç

Add me on Snapchat @HungryMumbaikar for live updates. Also, don't forget to follow @TheHungryMumbaikar on Instagram for your daily dosage of #foodporn! üòâ

#thehungrymumbaikar #mumbaifoodie #foodofmumbai #things2domnmumbai #mumbai #mumbaikar #dips #hummus #pate #wowtables

Hey! I'll be taking over @swiggyindia's Instagram account today evening and will be exploring the food scenes at Chowpatty, one of Mumbai's most popular tourist and hangout destinations! üòÅ

I'll be visiting some of the iconic restaurants in the Chowpatty area and will also need your help in deciding which places to visit and which dishes to try at some of these places. Follow @swiggyindia and tune in to their Instagram stories and discover the food at Chowpatty from my eyes! üòä

#thehungrymumbaikar #mumbaifoodie #foodofmumbai #things2domnmumbai #mumbai #mumbaikar #foodtrottingwithswiggy

Pav Bhaji + Maggi! Now that's a quirky combination! üò≤

You know those days where you come home hungry and fix yourself something to eat from the bizzare limited options available to you? This dish is an example of such creations! Maggi noodles with left over Pav Bhaji! Tag someone you'd be interested in trying this! üòÅ

Door No 1 has recently opened at Bandra Reclamation. Although the drinks here are expensive, the place has all the makings for an ideal hangout place with your buddies over drinks - retro themed ambience, loud music, and good old comfort food! üòä

Add me on Snapchat @HungryMumbaikar for live updates. Also, don't forget to follow @TheHungryMumbaikar on Instagram for your daily dosage of #foodporn! üòâ

#thehungrymumbaikar #mumbaifoodie #foodofmumbai #things2domnmumbai #mumbai #mumbaikar #noodles #pavbhaji #twist #comfortfood

Networking Now, a women's entrepreneurs club by Shaan Khaana, is back to cultivate the young millennial professionals to begin their mark in the city on 26th April at TAG - GourmArt Kitchen by Chef Ranveer Brar from 2 pm to 6 pm.

The event will be fun interactive discussion with a group of fabulous and successful panelists who would be talking about their startup life and how one can grow their business venture. The discussion will be based on various career options like blogging, media, fashion and food.

The list of panelist includes India's Pastry Queen Chef Sanajana Patel and founder of La Folie, Popular Fashion Lifestyle Blogger and founder of Love and Other Bugs - Ms. Shereen Sikka Bharwani and co-founder of popular fashion mulit-designer store, Atosa.

Entry Fee is Rs. 500. To Sign up, visit Insider.In or check out: https://insider.in/women-entrepreneurs-club-apr26-2017/event

Add me on Snapchat @HungryMumbaikar for live updates. Also, don't forget to follow @TheHungryMumbaikar on Instagram for your daily dosage of #foodporn! üòâ

#thehungrymumbaikar #mumbaifoodie #foodofmumbai #things2domnmumbai #mumbai #mumbaikar

Unlimited Pizza starting Rs. 199! Say whaaat! üò≤

Great news for all you pizza lovers! Pizza Hut has an amazing #UnlimitedPizzaFriday offer where you get unlimited pan pizzas and garlic bread starting at Rs. 199 every Friday! Tag someone you'd do this with! üòÅ

Unlimited veg pan pizza at Rs. 199, non-veg pan pizza at Rs. 249, unlimited Coke at an additional Rs. 99, what more can I say! It's a pizza party at @pizzahut_india! üéâ

Add me on Snapchat @HungryMumbaikar for live updates. Also, don't forget to follow @TheHungryMumbaikar on Instagram for your daily dosage of #foodporn! üòâ

#thehungrymumbaikar #mumbaifoodie #foodofmumbai #things2domnmumbai #mumbai #mumbaikar #pizza

Baby, I'm eggdicted to you! üòú

Here's the Eggs Benedict at @foodindigo, Colaba, part of their Sunday Brunch. Poached eggs on cooked ham and spinach, topped with hollandaise sauce, on moist English muffins, served with roasted baby potatoes and greens! Tag someone you'd visit with! üòç

Indigo has a Sunday Brunch every week that spoils you with a choice of unlimited wine, champagnes and cocktails along with a wide variety of food and desserts! Plus, they have live music too! Must visit for a Sunday drunch fiesta! üòÅ

Add me on Snapchat @HungryMumbaikar for live updates. Also, don't forget to follow @TheHungryMumbaikar on Instagram for your daily dosage of #foodporn! üòâ

#thehungrymumbaikar #mumbaifoodie #foodofmumbai #things2domnmumbai #mumbai #mumbaikar #eggs #sunday #brunch

Nothing like some hot & spicy Indian comfort food for the soul! üòç

Lunch earlier in the week was from @chawlas2_khar popular for their authentic North Indian cuisine. Here's their Rara Chicken and Fifty Fifty Tikka Masala with Ajwain Naan. Also tried their Dal Makhani, Dum Aalo Kashmiri and their signature Cream Chicken! All I can say is that lunch was a feast! üòÅ

@chawlas2_khar is a popular brand up north in Punjab and Delhi having more than 50 outlets! They are also present in Mumbai at Khar and have authentic North Indian food, that's delivered right to your doorstep. What I love is their quantity is amazing versus the price, hence making this a perfect value for money place to order your food! Do try them! üòä

#thehungrymumbaikar #mumbaifoodie #foodofmumbai #things2domnmumbai #mumbai #mumbaikar #food #foodgram #indianfood #punjabifood #comfortfood

Pizza + Pav Bhaji! Say whattt! üò≤

Here's the Bombay Spice Pizza Pie at @therollingpinindia, Lower Parel.  Tag someone you'd share this with! üòç

A cheesy pizza pie baked to perfection stuffed with tangy & spicy pav bhaji! A mouthwatering dish at @therollingpinindia who have also introduced a New Food Menu. Really liked the food here and recommended a visit soon! üòä

Add me on Snapchat @HungryMumbaikar for live updates. Also, don't forget to follow @TheHungryMumbaikar on Instagram for your daily dosage of #foodporn! üòâ

#thehungrymumbaikar #mumbaifoodie #foodofmumbai #things2domnmumbai #mumbai #mumbaikar #pizza #pavbhaji #cheese

Nothing like some comforting cheesecake for the soul! üòç

Here's the Warm Cheesecake from @saltwatercafe, Churchgate. Unlike most cheesecakes which are served cold or at room temperature, this one's served warm. And trust me, the warmth literally accentuates the flavour with the creamy cheesecake literally melting in your mouth leading to sweet tooth bliss! üòÅ

This cheesecake is my favourite in Mumbai! What's yours? Let me know your thoughts! üòä

Add me on Snapchat @HungryMumbaikar for live updates. Also, don't forget to follow @TheHungryMumbaikar on Instagram for your daily dosage of #foodporn! üòâ

#ContestAlert The Hungry Mumbaikar is celebrating its 2nd anniversary! To thank you guys for your constant love & support, I'm doing a series of giveaways! üéâ

Get a chance to win FREE MEAL VOUCHERS from @jwmarriottjuhu for their upcoming ARABIC FOOD FESTIVAL from 21st April at Lotus Cafe! üò≤

To participate in the contest below:
1. Like this picture and tag as many friends in comments below
2. Make sure you and your friends are following @jwmarriottjuhu and @TheHungryMumbaikar

2 winners will each get FREE MEAL VOUCHERS for the Arabic Food Festival at Lotus Cafe by @jwmarriottjuhu! üòÅ

Contest ends tomorrow evening. T&Cs apply. Get those entries rolling in! üòä

@riachangwani @faroutkhan Congratulations! You guys are winners of the contest! Please DM your name, mobile number, email ID so we can send you your vouchers.

To everyone else, thank you so much for participating! The response was overwhelming! Stay tuned for more contests on The Hungry Mumbaikar!
